name: 4×8 Wave Loading (~2 waves of 2 sets)
autoregulated: yes (increment 2nd wave if 1st wave feels good)
overview_and_execution: Wave 1: 2 sets of 8 (70%). Wave 2: Increase weight (75-80%) for another 2 sets of 8. Attempt a slight load bump on wave 2 each session if wave 1 is comfortable.
example_application: Wave1: 100 lb×8, 100 lb×8, then Wave2: 105 lb×8, 110 lb×8. Next session try to push wave2 further if possible.
important_notes: Helps progressive overload in small increments. Keep rest about 2 min between sets so you can maintain form.
